name: Uncle Fluffy's Cinema
description:
Looks like Uncle Fluffy is in big financial trouble. Try to help him raise some money by running his cinema.

Mouse control for everything but escaping. Click before dragging a new item to make sure you picked it up.

Esc to escape.

If you get softblocked, give a cat in sunglasses some random food they didn't order (preferably soda M, but other will do).
